title: Trinket optimisation
body:
Currently, if you use Oracle Alteration, you can sweep a large area for wards, made larger by moving.
However, when you detect a ward you need to destroy it, reducing the time allowed for ward searches.
Perhaps increase the duration for that particular trinket activation per ward discovered and destroyed?

Also, update the forum icon links in the lower right please :D

replies.body:
If the vision meta shifts and {{item:3364}}  **Oracles** becomes a little weak, then this could be a good change.

I think a really cool idea though, would be a support item with a passive that allows you to clear wards in 1 hit. Not sure if it would be broken, I don't think so though ahah :D

I think the amount an individual can kill is likely already taken into account. They probably expect an individual to only get 2. If the time increased, you'd be able to cover huge areas, and prevent someone from dropping another ward when you kill the first one (you know, like when they *really* want that spot warded so drop another immediately when you kill the first?).

TL;DR - That sounds very useful. *Too* useful.
